property.description: GUIX internal thread stack size in bytes. Must be greater than zero or empty.

constraint.display: Value must be greater than or zero or empty

property.description: GUIX system timer. Must be a multiple of TX_TIMER_TICKS_PER_SECOND or empty.

constraint.display: Value must be greater than or equal to 10 or empty

property.description: GUIX timer rate as a multiple of the ThreadX tick interrupt rate. Must be greater than zero or empty.

constraint.display: Value must be greater than or zero or empty

property.description: Useful for application logic, must correlate with the GX_SYSTEM_TIMER_TICKS definition. This is not used by GUIX but for user applications. Must be greater than zero or empty.

constraint.display: Value must be greater than or zero or empty

property.description: If your application has only one thread which utilizes the GUI API services, say yes to reduce system overhead.
GUIX disables UTF8 support if you say yes.
Size of GUIX Event Queue Size. Must be greater than zero or empty.

constraint.display: Value must be greater than or zero or empty

property.description: Priority of GUIX Internal Thread. The value must be between 0 to 31.

constraint.display: Value must be between 0 to 31, or empty

property.description: Time Slice value of GUIX Internal Thread. The value must be between 0(TX_NO_TIME_SLICE) to 0xFFFFFFFF.

constraint.display: Value must be a non-negative integer

property.display: Use User Data Field in GX_WIDGET Structure
property.description: GUIX allows users to use gx_widget_user_data member in GX_WIDGET Structure if you say yes.

config.content: #if (${config.el.gx_src.stack_size}+0) #define GX_THREAD_STACK_SIZE (${config.el.gx_src.stack_size}+0) #endif #if (${config.el.gx_src.system_timer_ms}+0) #define GX_SYSTEM_TIMER_MS (${config.el.gx_src.system_timer_ms}+0) #endif #if (${config.el.gx_src.system_timer_ticks}+0) #define GX_SYSTEM_TIMER_TICKS (${config.el.gx_src.system_timer_ticks}+0) #endif #if (${config.el.gx_src.ticks_second}+0) #define GX_TICKS_SECOND (${config.el.gx_src.ticks_second}+0) #endif #if (${config.el.gx_src.disable_multithread_support}) #define GUIX_DISABLE_MULTITHREAD_SUPPORT #endif #if (${config.el.gx_src.disable_utf8_support}) #define GX_DISABLE_UTF8_SUPPORT #endif #if (${config.el.gx_src.max_queue_events}+0) #define GX_MAX_QUEUE_EVENTS (${config.el.gx_src.max_queue_events}+0) #endif #define GX_SYSTEM_THREAD_PRIORITY (${config.el.gx_src.thread_priority}+0) #define GX_SYSTEM_THREAD_TIMESLICE (${config.el.gx_src.thread_time_slice}+0) #if (${config.el.gx_src.widget_user_data}) #define GX_WIDGET_USER_DATA #endif

constraint.display: Refer to release notes if multiple symbol definition linkage error occurs
